Welcome to "Making plots with `r hm`"!
This article provides a quick introduction to the basics of plotting in R, but mostly focuses on `r hm`'s own specialty plotting function, `draw()`.
Our `draw()` function is not a full replacement for either of R's main plotting systems (base and [ggplot][ggplot2]), but it is really useful.
